Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handleActivateLeader​(Player player, LeaderCard card)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are at the start or the end of the turn and the requested card is inactive, but can be activated.
      void handleBuyCard​(Player player, int row, int column, int slot)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are yet to play their main action, if card they requested to buy exists and they have enough resources and space to buy it.
      void handleChooseResources​(Player player, Storage storage)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the game is yet to start, the player who requested the resources already has enough and the resources being asked are within the rules.
      void handleDiscardLeader​(Player player, LeaderCard card)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the game is yet to start.
      void handleDiscardResources​(Player player)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active and if they already paid every cost, Discards all the remaining resources from the turn state and moves forward other players if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
      void handleEndTurn​(Player player)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they have played a main action, if they paid the cost of their action completely and completely stored all of their gain.

      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are yet to play their main action, if the bonus they requested is correctly granted by their leader cards and appliable and the column or row they want to get is within bounds.

      Handle the Message coming from the Client using the pattern Visitor
      void handlePay​(Player player, Storage storage)
      Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are requesting to pay a legal amount and if each of the places where resources are stored contains the resources they are requesting to pay with.

      • handleChooseResources

        public void handleChooseResources​(Player player,
                                  Storage storage)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the game is yet to start, the player who requested the resources already has enough and the resources being asked are within the rules. Stores them in the warehouse and checks if the game can start if the conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleChooseResources in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        storage - contains all the resources involved in the action

      • handleActivateLeader

        public void handleActivateLeader​(Player player,
                                 LeaderCard card)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are at the start or the end of the turn and the requested card is inactive, but can be activated. Activates the card if the conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleActivateLeader in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        card - is the card which the player is requesting to activate

      • handleDiscardLeader

        public void handleDiscardLeader​(Player player,
                                LeaderCard card)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the game is yet to start. If it is, checks if the player has more than 2 leader cards. Discards the card and checks if the game can start if the conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise. If it is not, checks if the player who requested the action is active and they are at the start or the end of the turn. Discards the card and moves the player forward if the conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleDiscardLeader in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        card - is the card which the player is requesting to discard

      • handleMarket

        public void handleMarket​(Player player,
                         int row,
                         int column,
                         boolean row_or_column,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Resource> bonus)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are yet to play their main action, if the bonus they requested is correctly granted by their leader cards and appliable and the column or row they want to get is within bounds. Updates the market, moves the player and adds the gained resources to the turn state is conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleMarket in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        row - is the row which the player requested
        columns - is the column which the player requested
        row_or_column - indicates whether the player has requested a row or a column
        bonus - contains all the resources requested through the leader card bonus

      • handleBuyCard

        public void handleBuyCard​(Player player,
                          int row,
                          int column,
                          int slot)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are yet to play their main action, if card they requested to buy exists and they have enough resources and space to buy it. Moves the card from the table to the selected slot and adds the cost to the turn state if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleBuyCard in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        row - is the row of the card which the player requested
        columns - is the column of the card which the player requested
        slot - is the slot requested for the bought card

      • handleProduction

        public void handleProduction​(Player player,
                             java.util.ArrayList<ProductionInterface> productions)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are yet to play their main action and if they have enough resources to activate the production. Adds the cost and gains of the production to the turn state if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleProduction in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        productions - contains all the production powers the player requested to activate

      • handlePay

        public void handlePay​(Player player,
                      Storage storage)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they are requesting to pay a legal amount and if each of the places where resources are stored contains the resources they are requesting to pay with. Removes the amount of each resource from both the player and the turn state if conditions are met, storing all produced resources in the strongbox if the player must not discard any, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handlePay in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        storage - contains all the resources involved in the action

      • handleStore

        public void handleStore​(Player player,
                        Storage storage)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they already paid every cost, if they are requesting to store a legal amount and if each of the places where resources are stored has enough room for the resources they are requesting to store there. Adds the resource amount to the player's corresponding place and removes it from the turn state if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleStore in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        storage - contains all the resources involved in the action

      • handleDiscardResources

        public void handleDiscardResources​(Player player)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active and if they already paid every cost, Discards all the remaining resources from the turn state and moves forward other players if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleDiscardResources in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action

      • handleRearrange

        public void handleRearrange​(Player player,
                            int swap1,
                            int swap2)
        upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active. swaps the player's warehouse rows if conditions are met, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleRearrange in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
        swap1 - is the first row to be swapped
        swap2 - is the second row to be swapped

      • handleEndTurn

        public void handleEndTurn​(Player player)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, checks if the player who requested the action is active, if they have played a main action, if they paid the cost of their action completely and completely stored all of their gain. End the turn and starts the next player's turn if conditions are met, triggering the last round if needed, raises corresponding error otherwise.
        Specified by:
        handleEndTurn in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action

      • handlePersistence

        public void handlePersistence​(Player player)
        Upon receiving the corresponding message, save the current state of the match in an appropriate json file
        Specified by:
        handlePersistence in interface Controller
        Parameters:
        player - is the player who requested the action
